roles.title: Frontend Development
roles.subtitle: Develop modern, responsive, and dynamic user interfaces using reactjs, nextjs, html, css, javascript, scss, bootstrap, antd, context etc.Implement user interface components and features based on design specifications.

roles.title: React.js Development
roles.subtitle: Work with front-end frameworks such as React to build modular and scalable web applications.

roles.title: Component-Based Architecture
roles.subtitle: Create reusable components for scalable and maintainable code.

roles.title: API Integration
roles.subtitle: Integrate with external APIs and third-party services.Fetch and manage data from backend services for dynamic content.

roles.title: Next.js Development
roles.subtitle: Utilize Next.js for server-side rendering (SSR) and building scalable applications.Optimize applications for performance, SEO, and user experience using Next.js features.

roles.title: State Management
roles.subtitle: Manage state using tools like Redux for complex applications.Implement stateful components and ensure efficient data flow.

roles.title: Semantic HTML Markup
roles.subtitle: Using semantic HTML tags for improved accessibility and search engine optimization.

roles.title: CSS Framework Integration
roles.subtitle: Integrating CSS frameworks to enhance styling and maintainability.

roles.title: Responsive Design
roles.subtitle: Ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness across various devices.

roles.title: CI/CD Implementation
roles.subtitle: Learning CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment.work with deployment tools to ensure smooth releases.

roles.title: Performance Optimization
roles.subtitle: Identify and address performance bottlenecks in the application.Optimize code for faster load times and improved user experience.

roles.title: Version Control
roles.subtitle: Use version control systems (e.g., Git) effectively for collaborative development.Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality.

roles.title: Cross-Browser Compatibility
roles.subtitle: Ensuring consistent functionality and appearance across different browsers.

roles.title: Wireframe Translation
roles.subtitle: Translating design wireframes into functional and structured REACT templates.

roles.title: Collaborative Design Integration
roles.subtitle: Working closely with design teams to integrate visuals into REACT templates.

roles.title: Code Optimization
roles.subtitle: Implementing best practices to optimize REACT code for performance and efficiency.

roles.title: SEO Focus
roles.subtitle: Implement and maintain SEO best practices.

roles.title: Agile Development
roles.subtitle: Work within an Agile development environment, participating in sprint planning and daily stand-ups.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver features on time.
